entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0.5 SDK Release Schedule #102522
  • CodeGen difference when manually extracting element to a local #102518
    9.0.0
  • Compiling against methods that accept params span with only System.Runtime reference produces compiler error #102513
  • Console.ReadKey() not picking up ConsoleModifiers when reading ConsoleKey.Backspace #102511
  • Arm/test: Update Helpers.tt and regenerate Helpers.cs #102510
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102492
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySequence<char> overload for WriteRawValue #102491
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64 Regressions in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Perf_FloatingPointTensorPrimitives<Double> #102514
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue failed in CI #102479
  • Abort on mono in SwiftErrorHandling #102478

Closed

  • Android AOT startup crash #102166
    9.0.0
  • Generated executable can't load main assembly #102393
  • [HttpStress] `HttpIOException` with `HttpRequestError=Unknown` and `QuicError=OperationAborted` on Windows #102202
    9.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Handle HTTP/3 cases better if needed #89097
    9.0.0
  • Intermittend failures in ThreadPoolTests on Mono Linux ARM64 #85960
    9.0.0
  • .NET native IOS and Android app - unable to establish IPv6 TCP connection #100454
  • .NET 9: Unhandled exceptions in background threads reported with empty managed frames #101729
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: Undefined resource string ID:0x80131621 #101581
  • Stress failure on x86 in JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral.dll #100694
    9.0.0
  • about ‘struct Memory<T>’ #102481
  • DEBUG_EXCEPTION_CATCH_HANDLER_FOUND events missing for exceptions caught by func-eval #102178
    9.0.0
  • Xcode local build failure: xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode, but active developer directory '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' is a command line tools instance #102471
  • Localized string needed for `workloads/wasm-experimental/description` #76968
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't require ICU libs for invariant globalization #100583
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] SignalR tests timing out #100445
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Various WASM hybrid globalization tests failing in many languages #102348
  • SQL Impersonation run failed with System.IO.FileLoadExceptions at .NET single file app #87132
  • Random System.IO.FileNotFoundException for runtime components #97251
  • Requires an SMB library that supports SMB3.1.1 and runs on Windows and Linux. #102477
  • Activity id of nettrace events are always 0 #102411
  • Tiered JIT changes behavior of code in the absence of explicit conv.r4 #98745
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #102529
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, source-build, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Fix event warning locations #102528
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix publishing PGO assets #102527
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Draft PR] Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Release builds should be debuggable as they were in .net7 #102521
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 1: copy source code only #102520
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Handle GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET in LinearScan::getKillSetForNode #102519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows Native AOT #102517
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Switch to AllowByRefLike naming in Mono as well #102516
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Set default for disableIntegrityCheck to true #102515
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Compact blocks in fgMoveBackwardJumpsToSuccessors #102512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #102509
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update condition for NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack build #102507
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [STJ] Add support for nullable reference annotations on properties #102499
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for exported types in illink XML formats #102487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Update mono struct lowering to use MonoMemoryManager #102486
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • Length guard in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange #102484
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Avoid MakeGenericMethod in XmlSerializer #102482
    area-Serialization
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 3 #102474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • LSRA: Refactor some of the methods around creating kill set #102469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DATAS tuning changes #102368
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Handle missing HTTP3 error cases #101923
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add `SetEntryAssembly()` API to `System.Reflection` #102271
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Delete DebugSymbols=true setting for the repo build #102392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Move backward jumps to before their successors after RPO-based layout #102461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2
  • Releveling CrstDynamicMT and CrstCodeVersioning to fix a stress bug. #102468
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.60, windows: 125.0.6422.60 #102417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix VS debugger issues with funceval and secondary threads #102470
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode #102473
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix description discovery for `wasm-experimental` workload #102367
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup CoreLib CompatibilitySuppressions #102363
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update version of code coverage report generator #102472
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add System.Formats.Sse #102238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add test for event warning origin issue #102405
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add ability to dump ILLink traces for all tests #102409
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, 9.0.0
  • `CodeVersionManager` updates #102298
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0] Fix handling exceptions on shutdown #101915
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.Store() #102262
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Bucket failing Xml trimming test apps #102449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102413
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add official build pipeline for `dotnet-experimental` feed #2590

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build on Linux #2574
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal to add "InvokeRequired" property to prevent invoke errors in some public controls #41064
  • dotnet-format-integration failing to format sdk #41060
  • NuGet package generation does not properly escape repository URL #41057

Closed

  • New repo with list of workloads in a .props file #34031
  • Android workload restore failure on Preview 4 #41058
  • PublishAOT property causes build failure when used with earlier TFMS in `TargetFrameworks` property #30814
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Stop Running SDK Diff Test Pipeline on Branches Affected by Installer -> SDK merge" #41070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix Test.binlog creation on Windows and provide better logging #41065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve repo artifacts logging #41059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify scenario-tests test invocation & define dependencies #41055
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Include HTTP status in ContainerHttpException #41041
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Skip Test Blocking Codeflow #41029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Refactor pipelines and add Installer jobs #40983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40932
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add collection literal support for `Memory<T>` and `ReadOnlyMemory<T>`. #8144

Closed

  • Open questions for `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #8130

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `is` pattern section of "first-class Span" #8141

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use same normalization for SectionName, FilePath, and GetOptionsForSourcePath #73620
  • Overlapped icons in inheritance margin #73615
  • IDE0290 code fix is invalid in `ref struct` #73614
    Backlog
  • Taghelpers break build on 8.0.300 with various errors (major impact, Area-Compilers) #73611

Closed

  • Serializable exception proposed by visual studio in dotnet 8 #73583
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-34920.221 #73610
  • explicit lambda return type behavior with covariant delegates #73319
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34920.65 #73605

PullRequests

Created

  • Add object browser support for ref struct interfaces #73621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extract method support for ref struct interfaces #73619
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch SG mode to 'balanced' by default #73618
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Shipping tasks #73617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Strengthen language version tests for Ref Struct Interfaces #73607
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose folding range functionality to Razor #73609
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with add-import and cancellation #73616
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move the remainder of FAR over to IAsyncEnumerable. #73613
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update compiler version #73602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Compute classifications for FAR results in parallel. #73599
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we might run code in the lightbulb post-disposal #73604
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add `AllowsKeywordRecommender` to `KeywordCompletionProvider` #73608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Only fetch options if needed #73600
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove addOperationsScope as it wasn't being used anywhere #73601
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Updated projects #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UseRateLimiter() does not work when called after UseMvc() #55826
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55825
  • Inconsistent namespaces #55824
  • Blazor Web assembly string injection is slow #55816
  • InputNumber bound to int? fails to validate when its content is emtpy #55815
  • Update the Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks to use a different docker image #55813
    9.0-preview6

Closed

  • Upgraded to .net core 8.0 and now app_offline.htm to shutdown the app pool for code deployment hangs. #55807
  • reopen issue #10117 - IIS app pool recycle throws 503 errors #41340
    9.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #55794
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during rollup on ppc64le #54393
    9.0-preview6
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during node build on RHEL8 #54394
    9.0-preview6
  • Explicitly calling `context.Fail(....)` in authorization policy requirement handler results in empty `policyAuthorizationResult.AuthorizationFailure.FailedRequirements` #55673
  • JwtSecurityToken does not parse the payload claims correctly. Claims are missing in the Payload array. #54975
  • How To: .NET 8 Blazor Web App + API + EntraId - how to authorize to SignalR #55819
  • Blazor-Hybrid with grpc Hot-Reload error. #55730
  • Blazor Loading Page Component #55756
  • blazor+winforms start failed with FileNotFoundException #55771
  • Perf regression: https, mvc, plaintext #55787
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #55793
  • If the CPU usage is too high, login authorization will fail. #55802

PullRequests

Created

  • Support passing OpenAPI spec version and document name via dotnet-getdocument #55823
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from project templates #55821
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add default rules for setting operation ID #55814
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `fa6de7f` to `33af80a` #55767
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Comment out selenium/standalone-chrome container images. #55812
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Remove unnecessary pragmas #55810
    area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5 #55800
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor

Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net Maui Blazor Hybrid has an issue with iOS Screen when you double click a button #22555
  • Binding Border.StrokeShape stopped working in 8.0.60-ci.net8.10665 #22549
    .NET 8 SR6
  • BugDragGestureRecognizer - codbehind - not working on iOS and Android - works on windows. #22545
    Backlog
  • MenuItem command stays disabled after remove-readd even if the canExecute is true #22544
    Backlog
  • Correct implementation for Android themed icons (make monochrome layer of app icon configurable) #22543
    Backlog
  • Problem clearing VisualStates of collection items in a CollectionView, when the collection employs a DataTemplate generated with a DataTemplateSelector #22541
  • [MAUI] D2-The slider control on Android platform does not behave the same as other platforms #22540
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]When the window is reduced and switched tab between MyRecipe and Recipe Search, the more button will disappear. #22539
    Backlog
  • [MAUI][Unstable] D23-A blank box appears when entering text in the "Message" editor. And no response when pressing Enter or Return key #22538
    Backlog

Closed

  • Dragging a file from Explorer over top of the application window will launch another process #22556
    Backlog
  • MAUI Web view PDF display appears to lock up appliation on ios #22560
  • App Crash on Android due to ScrollViewHandler.DisconnectHandler call during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page. #22443
  • Ios Maui sample app uses Chinese Simplified when Chinese Traditional is set in phone preferences #22547
  • [iOS] Setting Shell.TabBarIsVisible="False" in navigation page causes content from other pages to display under ShellTab #22548
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid Localization issue #22551
  • MAUI Toolkit DrawingView works fine in Debug mode but crashes in Release mode (Android) #22531
  • [MAC OS] SNMP Socket Permission Issues #22516
  • [MAUI] [WinUI] App crashes when using the startup task ability #22387

PullRequests

Created

  • [resizetizer] don't generate files during design-time builds #22562
  • Weak Parent #22561
    area-controls-general
  • [android] fix design-time build on project creation #22559
    area-tooling
  • Binding Border.StrokeShape stopped working - fix #22558
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Only the library projects updates build numbers #22554
    area-infrastructure
  • Update appium/drivers versions #22552
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Allow custom handler with key listener #22546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • Fix handlers.yml syntax #22557
  • Clean up some of the UI tests code #22550
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing

Updated

  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area-controls-shell
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview
  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor

    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate fully qualified lambda signatures for better compilation speed #33773
    9.0.0
  • Usefulness of TagWith() is diminished on SQL Azure "Query Performance Insights" UI - workarounds/features to restore? #33772

Closed

  • A question about the use of AddDbContextPool #33762
  • Invalid optimization of CASE-WHEN expressions #33751
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #33443 - JSON path is not properly formatted #33771

Merged

  • Remove invalid optimization of CASE-WHEN expressions #33754

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • Minor improvement of `SqlServerParameterBasedSqlProcessor.Optimize` #33758
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715

entry.content:

Closed
